title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: Generate Universally Unique Identifiers (UUID) version 4 (pseudo-random numbers).

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: Heavily based unreleased version ids::uuid().

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: hint Optional. Character (object coercible .character()) may used random seed.

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: character() representing valid UUID can validated uuid::UUIDvalidate().

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: helper function assign UUID identifying versions generated themes.

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
text: Davis KR, Peabody B, Leach P (2024). "Universally Unique IDentifiers (UUIDs)." RFC 9562. doi:10.17487/RFC9562 , https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc9562.

title: Random UUIDs generation — generate_uuid
code: # Random generate_uuid() #> [1] "cb3ee465-6e2e-4ec3-a5c8-c404fe174e4c"  generate_uuid() #> [1] "81bd36aa-3d2a-44d4-abbc-2145febe03ef"  # Persistent with hint param  hint <- "something as seed"  generate_uuid(hint) #> [1] "736f6d65-7468-496e-a720-617320736565"  generate_uuid(hint) #> [1] "736f6d65-7468-496e-a720-617320736565"

what: Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
title: Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
text: Read *.tmTheme file (really *.xml file) representing TextMate Sublime Text theme.

title: Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
text: tmtheme Path TextMate theme, *.tmTheme format.

title: Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
text: tibble::tibble().

title: Read and parse a TextMate theme — read_tmtheme
code: the_theme <- system.file("ext/test-color-theme.json",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) |>   # Generate the theme   vstheme2tmtheme()  # Check readLines(the_theme) |>   head(10) |>   cat(sep = "\n") #> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> #> <plist version="1.0"> #>   <dict> #>     <key>name</key> #>     <string>Tokyo Night</string> #>     <key>author</key> #>     <string>Enkia, rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>colorSpaceName</key> #>     <string>sRGB</string> #>     <key>semanticClass</key>  read_tmtheme(the_theme) #> # A tibble: 372 × 7 #>    section   name              scope value       foreground background fontStyle #>    <chr>     <chr>             <chr> <chr>       <chr>      <lgl>      <chr>     #>  1 highlevel name              NA    Tokyo Night NA         NA         NA        #>  2 highlevel author            NA    Enkia, rst… NA         NA         NA        #>  3 highlevel colorSpaceName    NA    sRGB        NA         NA         NA        #>  4 highlevel semanticClass     NA    theme.dark… NA         NA         NA        #>  5 highlevel comment           NA    Generated … NA         NA         NA        #>  6 highlevel uuid              NA    39323639-3… NA         NA         NA        #>  7 colors    background        NA    NA          #1A1B26    NA         NA        #>  8 colors    foreground        NA    NA          #A9B1D6    NA         NA        #>  9 colors    selection         NA    NA          #515C7E4D  NA         NA        #> 10 colors    inactiveSelection NA    NA          #515C7E25  NA         NA        #> # ℹ 362 more rows

what: Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
title: Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
text: Read *.json file representing Visual Studio Code theme.

title: Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
text: vstheme Path Visual Studio Code theme, *.json format.

title: Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
text: tibble::tibble().

title: Read and parse a Visual Studio Code theme — read_vstheme
code: vstheme <- system.file("ext/test-color-theme.json",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) read_vstheme(vstheme) #> # A tibble: 706 × 7 #>    section   name                  scope value   foreground background fontStyle #>    <chr>     <chr>                 <chr> <chr>   <chr>      <lgl>      <chr>     #>  1 highlevel name                  NA    Tokyo … NA         NA         NA        #>  2 highlevel author                NA    Enkia   NA         NA         NA        #>  3 highlevel type                  NA    dark    NA         NA         NA        #>  4 colors    foreground            NA    NA      #787C99    NA         NA        #>  5 colors    descriptionForeground NA    NA      #515670    NA         NA        #>  6 colors    disabledForeground    NA    NA      #545C7E    NA         NA        #>  7 colors    focusBorder           NA    NA      #545C7E33  NA         NA        #>  8 colors    errorForeground       NA    NA      #515670    NA         NA        #>  9 colors    widget.shadow         NA    NA      #FFFFFF00  NA         NA        #> 10 colors    scrollbar.shadow      NA    NA      #00000033  NA         NA        #> # ℹ 696 more rows

what: rstudiothemes: Ports of Visual Studio Code Themes for 'RStudio' — rstudiothemes-package
title: rstudiothemes: Ports of Visual Studio Code Themes for 'RStudio' — rstudiothemes-package
text: Create install 'RStudio' themes originated Visual Studio Code themes.

title: rstudiothemes: Ports of Visual Studio Code Themes for 'RStudio' — rstudiothemes-package
text: Maintainer: Diego Hernangómez diego.hernangomezherrero@gmail.com (ORCID) [copyright holder]

what: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
title: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
text: Read *.json file representing Visual Studio Code theme write equivalent TextMate theme (*.tmTheme).

title: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
code: vstheme2tmtheme(   vstheme,   out_tm = tempfile(fileext = ".tmTheme"),   name = NULL,   author = NULL )

title: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
text: vstheme Path Visual Studio Code theme, *.json format. out_tm Path resulting file written. default temporal file (tempfile()). name Optional. name theme. provided name vstheme used. author Optional. author theme. provided name vstheme used.

title: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
text: function called side effects. return (invisible()) path file.

title: Convert a Visual Studio Code theme into a TextMate theme — vstheme2tmtheme
code: vstheme <- system.file("ext/test-simple-color-theme.json",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) path <- vstheme2tmtheme(vstheme) #> This vscode theme does not have author, use the `author` parameter  path #> [1] "C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpOGrnFt\\filef144d1e16db.tmTheme"  readLines(path) |>   head(50) |>   cat(sep = "\n") #> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> #> <plist version="1.0"> #>   <dict> #>     <key>name</key> #>     <string>Skeletor Syntax</string> #>     <key>author</key> #>     <string>rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>colorSpaceName</key> #>     <string>sRGB</string> #>     <key>semanticClass</key> #>     <string>theme.dark.skeletor_syntax</string> #>     <key>comment</key> #>     <string>Generated with rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>uuid</key> #>     <string>65316264-3362-4031-a334-396431643737</string> #>     <key>settings</key> #>     <array> #>       <dict> #>         <key>settings</key> #>         <dict> #>           <key>background</key> #>           <string>#2B2836</string> #>           <key>foreground</key> #>           <string>#DCE7FD</string> #>           <key>selection</key> #>           <string>#55535E</string> #>           <key>lineHighlight</key> #>           <string>#55535E</string> #>           <key>caret</key> #>           <string>#BD93F9</string> #>           <key>invisibles</key> #>           <string>#363340</string> #>           <key>gutterForeground</key> #>           <string>#655E7F</string> #>         </dict> #>       </dict> #>       <dict> #>         <key>name</key> #>         <string>comment</string> #>         <key>scope</key> #>         <string>comment</string> #>         <key>settings</key> #>         <dict> #>           <key>foreground</key> #>           <string>#655E7F</string> #>         </dict> #>       </dict> #>       <dict> #>         <key>name</key> #>         <string>doctype</string>
